stored_fields.description: A comma-separated list of stored fields to return in the response

preference.description: Specify the node or shard the operation should be performed on (default: random)

realtime.description: Specify whether to perform the operation in realtime or search mode

refresh.description: Refresh the shard containing the document before performing the operation

_source.description: True or false to return the _source field or not, or a list of fields to return

_source_exclude.description: A list of fields to exclude from the returned _source field

_source_include.description: A list of fields to extract and return from the _source field

body.description: Document identifiers; can be either `docs` (containing full document information) or `ids` (when index and type is provided in the URL.
